summary: Makes adjustments to the artifacts in Skyrim to resemble the stats of shared artifacts in Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
After getting deep as fuck into Morrowind for a while, I decided to come back to Skyrim and make a few changes. Before anyone starts in on the comment section about going from Morrowind back to Skyrim, let me just explain that after some rough midnight fun with Morrowind, it's nice to have a little backrub from Skyrim, okay?

Now what did I fuck with this time, you ask? It's simple. I did what suprisingly has not been done yet. I looked up the stats on Morrowind's artifacts and made the subsequent changes to the same artifacts in Skyrim because I like Morrowind's view of artifacts better. I changed the actual enchantments and then I also changed the value, weight and armor/attack depending if the item in question was an armor piece or a weapon. Fucking duh...

Let's go over the new changes, shall we?

[size=4]Savior's Hide:[/size]
Armor: 266
Weight: 15
Value: 150,000
Enchant: Resist Magicka 60%

[size=4]Masque Of Clavicus Vile:[/size]
Armor: 266
Weight: 15
Value: 15,000
Enchant: Fortify Barter/Persuasion 30%

[size=4]Auriel's Shield:[/size]
Armor: 200
Weight: 30
Value: 17,000
Enchant: Not changed

[size=4]Spell Breaker:[/size]
Armor: 233
Weight: 25
Value: 115,000
Enchant: Unchanged

[size=4]Mace Of Molag Bal:[/size]
Attack: 45.50
Weight: 45
Value: 25,000
Enchant: Absorb 20 Magicka, Absorb 15 Stamina
Misc: Increased speed (from 0.8 to 1.3), decreased charge (from 3k to 1.5k)


[size=4]Staff Of Magnus:[/size]
Attack: 0
Weight: 10
Value: 210,000
Enchant: Unchanged
Misc: Increased reach to 1.8, decreased speed to 1.75

[size=4]Volendrung:[/size]
Attack: 39
Weight: 32
Value: 600
Enchant: Unchanged
Misc: Increased speed to 1.0, increased reach to 1.5

[size=4]Auriel's Bow:[/size]
Attack: 50
Weight: 16
Value: 30,000
Enchant: Unchanged
Misc: None

[size=4]Keening:[/size]
Attack: 45
Weight: 9
Value: 400,000
Enchant: Unchanged
Misc: Increased speed to 2.5, increased reach to 1.0

[size=4]Mehrune's Razor:[/size]
Attack: 42.50
Weight: 6
Value: 5,000
Enchant: Unchanged
Misc: Increased speed to 2.5, increased reach to 1.0<br />


[size=4]Compatibility:[/size]
With anything that does not affect these stats

[size=4]Credit:[/size]
Bethesda- All resources
UESP- Stats for Morrowind gear
author: xxaion
